page.title: 07HALLOWEEN
page.content: Every year, on the{31st}of{October, children from Croy go guising.They get dressed up in costumes and go round the many houses in Croy telling jokes and singing songs.They do this simply for sweets and peanuts. Nearly every year there is a Halloween party at the Youth Club and everybody gets packed full of food before going out guising.We normally get our photo taken and there are lots of turnips,which are hollowed out and have a face cut in them and a candle inserted inside, sitting on the window_sills. You can see the many different costumes that the people are wearing.They range from animal look_a_likes to weird looking robots and demons,even cartoon characters.
